title: About
body:
# Hi. My name is John David, and I am an analyst and software engineer, musician, critical thinker and a concerned and thoughtfully engaged human. 

# I write about Data Science, Software Engineering, Deep Learning, Art, Music and whatever else I may be interested in documenting. My background is varied and eclectic. 

# I have been a singer, an actor, a guitar player, a math geek, a hacker, a salesman, a Real Estate Broker and a good friend. I hold an MS Comp Sci from UMSL and continue to pursue education and knowledge whereever and whenever I can.
